1: וַיִּקְרָ֥א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>called</n> יִצְחָ֛ק <sup>3327 </sup> <n>And Isaac</n> אֶֽל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> יַעֲקֹ֖ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>Jacob</n> וַיְבָ֣רֶךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>and blessed</n> אֹת֑וֹ <sup>853 </sup> וַיְצַוֵּ֙הוּ֙ <sup>6680 </sup> <n>him and charged</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>him and said</n> ל֔וֹ לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תִקַּ֥ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>unto him Thou shalt not take</n> אִשָּׁ֖ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>a wife</n> מִבְּנ֥וֹת <sup>1323 </sup> <n>of the daughters</n> כְּנָֽעַן׃ <sup>3667 </sup> <n>of Canaan</n>

3: וְאֵ֤ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>And God</n> שַׁדַּי֙ <sup>7706 </sup> <n>Almighty</n> יְבָרֵ֣ךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>bless</n> אֹֽתְךָ֔ <sup>853 </sup> וְיַפְרְךָ֖ <sup>6509 </sup> <n>thee and make thee fruitful</n> וְיַרְבֶּ֑ךָ <sup>7235 </sup> <n>and multiply</n> וְהָיִ֖יתָ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>you may become</n> לִקְהַ֥ל <sup>6951 </sup> <n>thee that thou mayest be a multitude</n> עַמִּֽים׃ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of people</n>
4: וְיִֽתֶּן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And give</n> לְךָ֙ אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בִּרְכַּ֣ת <sup>1293 </sup> <n>thee the blessing</n> אַבְרָהָ֔ם <sup>85 </sup> <n>of Abraham</n> לְךָ֖ וּלְזַרְעֲךָ֣ <sup>2233 </sup> <n>to thee and to thy seed</n> אִתָּ֑ךְ <sup>854 </sup> <n>that</n> לְרִשְׁתְּךָ֙ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>with thee that thou mayest inherit</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the land</n> מְגֻרֶ֔יךָ <sup>4033 </sup> <n>wherein thou art a stranger</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> נָתַ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>gave</n> אֱלֹהִ֖ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>which God</n> לְאַבְרָהָֽם׃ <sup>85 </sup> <n>unto Abraham</n>

18: וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֨ם <sup>7925 </sup> <n>rose up early</n> יַעֲקֹ֜ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>And Jacob</n> בַּבֹּ֗קֶר <sup>1242 </sup> <n>in the morning</n> וַיִּקַּ֤ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>and took</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאֶ֙בֶן֙ <sup>68 </sup> <n>the stone</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>he</n> שָׂ֣ם <sup>7760 </sup> <n>that he had put</n> מְרַֽאֲשֹׁתָ֔יו <sup>4763 </sup> <n>[for] his pillows</n> וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <sup>7760 </sup> <n>and set it up</n> אֹתָ֖הּ <sup>853 </sup> מַצֵּבָ֑ה <sup>4676 </sup> <n>[for] a pillar</n> וַיִּצֹ֥ק <sup>3332 </sup> <n>and poured</n> שֶׁ֖מֶן <sup>8081 </sup> <n>oil</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> רֹאשָֽׁהּ׃ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>upon the top of it</n>
19: וַיִּקְרָ֛א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>And he called</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שֵֽׁם־ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>the name</n> הַמָּק֥וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>of that place</n> הַה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> בֵּֽית־ אֵ֑ל <sup>1008 </sup> <n>Bethel</n> וְאוּלָ֛ם <sup>199 </sup> <n>but</n> ל֥וּז <sup>3870 </sup> <n>[was called] Luz</n> שֵׁם־ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>the name</n> הָעִ֖יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of that city</n> לָרִאשֹׁנָֽה׃ <sup>7223 </sup> <n>at the first</n>
20: וַיִּדַּ֥ר <sup>5087 </sup> <n>vowed</n> יַעֲקֹ֖ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>And Jacob</n> נֶ֣דֶר <sup>5088 </sup> <n>a vow</n> לֵאמֹ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> יִהְיֶ֨ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> אֱלֹהִ֜ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>If God</n> עִמָּדִ֗י <sup>5978 </sup> <n>me</n> וּשְׁמָרַ֙נִי֙ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>will be with me and will keep me</n> בַּדֶּ֤רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>in this way</n> הַזֶּה֙ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>that</n> אָנֹכִ֣י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> הוֹלֵ֔ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>that I go</n> וְנָֽתַן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and will give</n> לִ֥י לֶ֛חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>me bread</n> לֶאֱכֹ֖ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>to eat</n> וּבֶ֥גֶד <sup>899 </sup> <n>and raiment</n> לִלְבֹּֽשׁ׃ <sup>3847 </sup> <n>to put on</n>
21: וְשַׁבְתִּ֥י <sup>7725 </sup> <n>So that I come again</n> בְשָׁל֖וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>in peace</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> אָבִ֑י <sup>1 </sup> <n>to my father's</n> וְהָיָ֧ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>then</n> יְהוָ֛ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>then shall the LORD</n> לִ֖י לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>be my God</n>
22: וְהָאֶ֣בֶן <sup>68 </sup> <n>And this stone</n> הַזֹּ֗את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> שַׂ֙מְתִּי֙ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>which I have set</n> מַצֵּבָ֔ה <sup>4676 </sup> <n>[for] a pillar</n> יִהְיֶ֖ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> אֱלֹהִ֑ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>shall be God's</n> וְכֹל֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> תִּתֶּן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and of all that thou shalt give</n> לִ֔י עַשֵּׂ֖ר <sup>6237 </sup> <n>me I will surely</n> אֲעַשְּׂרֶ֥נּוּ <sup>6237 </sup> <n>give the tenth</n> לָֽךְ׃
